name: search_country
description: Return data of the country determined by query.

query.description: The name or IATA code of the country.

key.description: Determine whether query is a name (default) or an IATA code. It must be either "name" or "code".

name: search_city
description: Return data of the city determined by query.

query.description: The name or IATA code of the city.

key.description: Determine whether query is a name (default) or an IATA code. It must be either "name" or "code".

name: search_airport
description: Return data of the airport determined by query.

query.description: The name or IATA code of the airport.

key.description: Determine whether query is a name (default) or an IATA code. It must be either "name" or "code".

name: search_airline
description: Return data of the airline determined by query.

query.description: The name or IATA code of the airline.

key.description: Determine whether query is a name (default) or an IATA code. It must be either "name" or "code".

name: search_alliance
description: Return data of the alliance determined by query.

query.description: The name or IATA code of the alliance.

key.description: Determine whether query is a name (default) or an IATA code. It must be either "name" or "code".

name: search_airplane
description: Return data of the airplane determined by query.

query.description: The name or IATA code of the airplane.

key.description: Determine whether query is a name (default) or an IATA code. It must be either "name" or "code".

name: search_routes
description: Return a list of routes that meet specific conditions.

depart_airport.description: IATA of an airport of departure.

arrival_airport.description: IATA of an airport of arrival.

page.description: A page number. 0(default) is the first page.

page_size.description: Number of routes in a page. Default: 10.

name: ask_to_user
description: You can ask user for guidance when you think you need more information to handle the task, but you should use this tool as less as you can.

question.description: The question you want to ask to user.

name: finish
description: Finish the task and give your answer.
